cta.title: Sundays
cta.deck: In this current season, we gather online every Sunday at 10.40am with just a limited number of people attending in person at the Gateway Centre. Click here for details.

cta.title: Alpha
cta.deck: Eager to explore Christianity further? Then join us for an online Alpha. Alpha is an opportunity for people to investigate the Christian faith for themselves. Alpha is really for anyone who's curious. Exploring topics such as "Is there more to life than this?" and "Who is Jesus?" Each week will involve watching a 20-25 minute presentation, followed by an online discussion via video call.

cta.title: Latest Sermon
cta.deck: Listen to the sermon from last Sunday.

quotes.quote: I love Gateway. It's my family!
quotes.author: David

quotes.quote: My Lifegroup are the warmest, kindest people.
quotes.author: Jill

quotes.quote: I've been made to feel so welcome at Gateway.
quotes.author: Karen

deck.text: Gateway Church is a community of people committed to following Jesus and loving other people. Our church community is made up of people of all ages and from all walks of life. Words on a webpage can never give a true reflection of who we are, so we think the best way to get to know us is to come along on a Sunday then come to one of our monthly welcome lunches.
